metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

inputs.uri: @concat('https://api.cyble.ai/engine/api/v2/y/iocs?ioc=', coalesce(if(equals(toLower(item()?['kind']),'filehash'), item()?['properties']?['hashValue'], null), if(equals(toLower(item()?['kind']),'ip'), item()?['properties']?['address'], null), if(equals(toLower(item()?['kind']),'url'), item()?['properties']?['url'], null), if(equals(toLower(item()?['kind']),'host'), item()?['properties']?['hostName'], null), if(equals(toLower(item()?['kind']),'mailbox'), item()?['properties']?['mailboxPrimaryAddress'], null), ''))

No_Comments_Skip.inputs: No enriched IOCs found; skipping comment.

metadata.title: Cyble-IOC_Enrichment-Playbook
metadata.description: This playbook leverages the Cyble API to enrich IP, Domain, Url & Hash indicators, found in Microsoft Sentinel incidents, with the following context: Risk Score, Confidence, etc. The enrichment content will be posted as a comment in the Microsoft Sentinel incident
prerequisites: To use the Cyble Endpoints for Azure connector, you will need a valid API token from Cyble Vision platform.

basics.description: Enrich IOCs using the Cyble Threat Intelligence API.

indicators.Name: @item()?['ioc']
indicators.pattern: @if(equals(item()?['ioc_type'],'FileHash-SHA256'), concat('[[file:hashes.''SHA-256'' = ''', item()?['ioc'], ''']]'), if(equals(item()?['ioc_type'],'IPv4'), concat('[[ipv4-addr:value = ''', item()?['ioc'], ''']]'), concat('[[url:value = ''', item()?['ioc'], ''']]')))

metadata.title: Cyble-ThreatIntelligence-Ingest-Playbook
metadata.description:
This playbook imports IoC lists from Cyble and stores them as Threat Intelligence Indicators in Microsoft Sentinel, for detection purposes.

This playbook depends on Cyble-ThreatIntelligence-Ingest that need to be installed **manually** before installing this playbook.
prerequisites: To use the Cyble for Azure connector, you will need a valid API token from Cyble

releaseNotes.title: Cyble-ThreatIntelligence-Ingest
releaseNotes.description:
This playbook imports IoC lists from Cyble and stores them as Threat Intelligence Indicators in Microsoft Sentinel, for detection purposes.

This playbook depends on Cyble-ThreatIntelligence-Ingest that need to be installed **manually** before installing this playbook.
prerequisites: To use the Cyble for Azure connector, you will need a valid API token from Cyble

basics.description: Import IOCs using the Cyble Threat Intelligence API.

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: Please refer to the following before installing the solution:

Review the solution Release Notes

There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

This solution provides playbooks for Cyble Vision Threat Intelligence ingestion and IOC enrichment, integrating Cyble APIs with Microsoft Sentinel.

Playbooks: 2

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
